CIRCULAR No. 07/2013

Subject: GROUP DAILY PASS,

It has been brought to the notice of this Bureau that the daily passes are issued in

group which leaves chances of misuse. There is no provision of issuance of group passes
in AEP instructions. Every individual should be issued one daily pass separately with a
direction to establish his or her identity at the time of allowing access at entry point on the
basis of identity card. Issuance of group pass is not in order and violation of the existing
instructions.

Henceforth, every individual will be issued with a single pass. The name of other

shall not be included in the said pass. Violation of this circular shall be viewed seriously.

This issues with approval of COSCA.

Ke. ey

Dy. Commissioner of Security (CA)
